ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: What comfort and ease they had delighted in!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the life of ease in which they took delight!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and other bounties which they enjoyed yet left behind!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And favours amongst which they were rejoicing!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And comforts of life wherein they used to take delight!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And goodly things wherein they rejoiced;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and what prosperity they had rejoiced in!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And pleasant things wherein they took delight!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and pleasant things in which they delighted!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the delights which they had been enjoying!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and the affluence wherein they rejoiced!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And wealth (and conveniences of life), wherein they had taken such delight!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And comforts of life wherein they used to take delight!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and good things in which they took delight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And comforts they used to enjoy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And comfort wherein they were amused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:27] and the bounty, the comforts, in which they rejoiced!, [in which] they lived luxuriously.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And pleasant things wherein they took delight) wherein they exulted!
